name: journey_into_nyx_gigantic
description: A very large Journey into Nyx (Theros block) package featuring Constellation, Strive, Bestow-style Aura Creatures, Heroic, Devotion, Monstrosity, Inspired, Tribute, Scry, enchantment-matters, and God-style templates.

Creature: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets {THIS}, put a +1/+1 counter on it and {HEROIC_W}.
Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, {THIS} gains lifelink until end of turn and {GAIN_LIFE_SMALL}.
Vigilance. {CONSTELLATION_W_TRIGGER}
Monstrosity {X3} — {MONSTROSITY_X} When {THIS} becomes monstrous, {TAP_TWO} Creatures your opponents control.
Inspired — Whenever {THIS} becomes untapped, {GAIN_LIFE_SMALL} then you may exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control.
Tribute 2 (As this creature enters, an opponent may put two +1/+1 counters on it.) When {THIS} enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn’t paid, destroy target tapped creature.
Devotion — {STATIC_DEVOTION_W}
Whenever you cast an Aura spell, put a +1/+1 counter on {THIS}.
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets {THIS}, tap up to one target creature. That creature doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.
Instant: Strive — {STRIVE_W} (This spell costs {STRIVE_W} more to cast for each target beyond the first.) Any number of target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Scry 1.
Exile target attacking or blocking creature with power {MV_OR_LESS}.
Tap up to two target creatures. You gain 2 life.
Sorcery: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. Constellation — If an enchantment entered under your control this turn, create two more.
Enchantment: Creatures you control get +1/+1. Constellation — Whenever {AN_ENCH enters}, you gain 1 life.
Flash. {DICTATE_W} (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Legendary Enchantment Creature — God
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to white is less than five, {THIS} isn’t a creature.
Other creatures you control get +1/+1.
AuraCreature:
Bestow {BESTOW_W}
Enchanted creature has "Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell you control, tap up to one target creature."
AuraLand:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add {W}." and "Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life."
Artifact:
Whenever you cast an Aura spell, scry 1.
{2}, {T}: You gain 2 life.
Activated: {1}{W}: Target creature gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
{2}{W}: Exile target enchantment you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control.

Creature: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets {THIS}, draw a card, then discard a card.
Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, scry 1.
Inspired — Whenever {THIS} becomes untapped, you may gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to {MV}. If you do, untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.
Monstrosity {X2} — {MONSTROSITY_X} When {THIS} becomes monstrous, return up to one target nonland permanent to its owner’s hand.
Tribute 2 — When {THIS} enters, if tribute wasn’t paid, gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
Devotion — {STATIC_DEVOTION_U}
Whenever you cast an Aura spell, draw a card.
Instant: Strive — {STRIVE_U} Any number of target creatures each get -4/-0 until end of turn.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. Constellation — If an enchantment entered under your control this turn, counter that spell instead.
Return target enchantment you control to its owner's hand. Draw a card.
Sorcery: Draw two cards. If you control an enchantment, draw an additional card.
Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is your devotion to blue. Put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
Enchantment:
Flash. {DICTATE_U}
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, scry 1.

Legendary Enchantment Creature — God
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to blue is less than five, {THIS} isn’t a creature.
Creatures you control have flying.
AuraCreature:
Bestow {BESTOW_U}
Enchanted creature has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card."
AuraLand:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add {U}." and "Whenever you cast an Aura spell, untap this land."
Artifact:
{T}: Add {C}. Spend this mana only to cast enchantment spells.
Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, scry 1.
Activated: {1}{U}: Return target enchanted permanent you control to its owner's hand.

Creature: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets {THIS}, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Inspired — Whenever {THIS} becomes untapped, exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a Gold token. (It’s an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
Monstrosity {X2} — {MONSTROSITY_X} When {THIS} becomes monstrous, destroy target creature an opponent controls.
Tribute 2 — When {THIS} enters, if tribute wasn’t paid, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
Devotion — {STATIC_DEVOTION_B}
Whenever you cast an Aura spell, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Instant: Strive — {STRIVE_B} Any number of target creatures each get -2/-2 until end of turn.
Destroy target creature with power {MV_OR_GREATER}. You gain 2 life.
Exile target enchantment from a graveyard. Scry 1. Draw a card.
Sorcery: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Constellation — If an enchantment entered under your control this turn, that player loses 2 life.
Return target enchantment or creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to its mana value.
Enchantment:
Flash. {DICTATE_B}
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you gain 1 life and scry 1.

Legendary Enchantment Creature — God
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to black is less than five, {THIS} isn’t a creature.
At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
AuraCreature:
Bestow {BESTOW_B}
Enchanted creature has lifelink and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card."
AuraLand:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add {B}." and "Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters under your control, each opponent loses 1 life."
Artifact: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice an enchantment: Draw two cards. You lose 2 life.
Activated: {1}{B}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. If it’s enchanted, it gets -3/-3 until end of turn instead.

Creature: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets {THIS}, {THIS} gets +2/+0 until end of turn. If that spell is an Aura, {THIS} gains first strike until end of turn.
Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, {THIS} deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Inspired — Whenever {THIS} becomes untapped, you may exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.
Monstrosity {X2} — {MONSTROSITY_X} When {THIS} becomes monstrous, it deals 2 damage to each creature your opponents control.
Tribute 2 — When {THIS} enters, if tribute wasn’t paid, {THIS} fights target creature you don’t control.
Devotion — {STATIC_DEVOTION_R}
Whenever you cast an Aura spell, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
Instant: Strive — {STRIVE_R} {THIS_SPELL} deals 2 damage to any number of targets.
Target creature you control gains double strike until end of turn. Scry 1.
Destroy target artifact. If you control an enchantment, {THIS_SPELL} deals 2 damage to that artifact’s controller.
Sorcery: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. Constellation — If an enchantment entered under your control this turn, scry 2.
Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. It fights up to one target creature you don’t control.
Enchantment:
Flash. {DICTATE_R}
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.

Legendary Enchantment Creature — God
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to red is less than five, {THIS} isn’t a creature.
Creatures you control have haste.
AuraCreature:
Bestow {BESTOW_R}
Enchanted creature has "Whenever this creature attacks, it deals 1 damage to each opponent."
AuraLand:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add {R}." and "Whenever you cast an Aura spell, this land deals 1 damage to each opponent."
Artifact: {2}, {T}: {THIS} deals 1 damage to any target. Activate only if you control an enchantment.
Activated: {1}{R}: Target creature can’t block this turn. If it’s enchanted, {THIS} deals 1 damage to that creature.

Creature: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets {THIS}, put two +1/+1 counters on it.
Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on {THIS}.
Inspired — Whenever {THIS} becomes untapped, add {G}{G}. Until end of turn, you don’t lose this mana as steps and phases end.
Monstrosity {X3} — {MONSTROSITY_X} When {THIS} becomes monstrous, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.
Tribute 2 — When {THIS} enters, if tribute wasn’t paid, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Devotion — {STATIC_DEVOTION_G}
Whenever you cast an Aura spell, draw a card.
Instant: Strive — {STRIVE_G} Any number of target creatures each get a +1/+1 counter and trample until end of turn.
Target creature you control fights up to one target creature you don’t control. Scry 1.
Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If you control an enchantment, you gain 3 life.
Sorcery: Search your library for a creature or enchantment card with mana value {MV_OR_LESS}, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Create two 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens. Constellation — If an enchantment entered under your control this turn, those tokens enter with a +1/+1 counter.
Enchantment:
Flash. {DICTATE_G}
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.

Legendary Enchantment Creature — God
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to green is less than five, {THIS} isn’t a creature.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have it fight target creature you don’t control.

Bestow {BESTOW_G}
Enchanted creature has "Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell you control, put a +1/+1 counter on it."
AuraLand:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add {G}." and "Whenever an enchantment enters under your control, untap this land."
Artifact: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast creature or enchantment spells.
Activated: {1}{G}: Target creature you control gains hexproof until end of turn. If it’s enchanted, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

Artifact: Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
{3}, {T}: Create a 2/2 colorless enchantment creature token.
Enchantment: Constellation — Whenever {AN_ENCH enters}, scry 1, then you may draw a card if this is the second time this ability resolved this turn.

Creature: Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, {GENERIC_CONSTELLATION_EFFECT}.
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets {THIS}, {GENERIC_HEROIC_EFFECT}.
Instant: Strive — {STRIVE_GENERIC} Choose any number of target creatures. {GENERIC_STRIVE_PUMP}.

HEROIC_W: tap target creature an opponent controls
put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control
CONSTELLATION_W_TRIGGER: Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn
MONSTROSITY_X: If this creature isn’t monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.
DICTATE_W: Whenever a creature attacks, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn
DICTATE_U: Whenever you draw a card, each opponent mills a card
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, scry 1
DICTATE_B: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, each opponent loses 1 life
DICTATE_R: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker it’s attacking
DICTATE_G: Creatures you control get +2/+2 as long as it’s your turn
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn
STATIC_DEVOTION_W: Each other enchantment you control gets +1/+1 as long as your devotion to white is five or more.
STATIC_DEVOTION_U: Noncreature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast as long as your devotion to blue is five or more.
STATIC_DEVOTION_B: Creatures you control have lifelink as long as your devotion to black is five or more.
STATIC_DEVOTION_R: Creatures you control have haste as long as your devotion to red is five or more.
STATIC_DEVOTION_G: Creatures you control get +1/+1 as long as your devotion to green is five or more.
GENERIC_CONSTELLATION_EFFECT: target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn
draw a card, then discard a card
GENERIC_HEROIC_EFFECT: it gains hexproof until end of turn
GENERIC_STRIVE_PUMP: each of those creatures gets +1/+1 until end of turn
put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures
those creatures gain trample until end of turn
